name: NanitShow
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Watch your baby’s crib on your Echo Show or Echo Spot! 

Google Wi-Fi users, 
please disable DNS rebinding protection for this skill to work. Please follow the instructions in this link: https://support.google.com/wifi/answer/9144137?hl=en

If you are still experiencing issues please contact our support for assistance help@nanit.com.

Nanit is the only video monitor that puts your baby's sleep development right in your hands. And now, with our Amazon Alexa integration, you can go hands-free and watch Nanit’s live stream right on your Alexa Show or Spot. 

To get started, enable the skill and link your Nanit account. In seconds, you'll be able to watch your baby’s crib by asking Alexa:

“Alexa, Show me Lily’s crib”
“Alexa, Show me Lily”

With Alexa, Nanit is smarter than ever, making it easier for you to understand your baby's night, so that baby - and the whole family - can get more sleep.

Visit www.nanit.com to learn more about Nanit and to download the Nanit app for iOS and Android.
